contents.text: Welcome to Fingerprint Digital, your home for thousands of hours of kids' learning entertainment powered by our breakthrough technology.
For customer support and billing, press 1.
For billing and account questions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account team.

navigationGoals: I need to update the credit card on file for my subscription.
Apply my veteran discount to my subscription billing and update my payment method
I need to review my subscription payment history and update my billing method.
I need to update my payment information and ask about last month’s billing charge.
I need to apply a student discount and update my payment information on my subscription account.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: The app keeps crashing when I try to play a video; I need troubleshooting help.
My app keeps crashing on my tablet when I try to play videos, please help me fix it
I’m encountering a DRM license acquisition error when streaming content and need help troubleshooting.
I’m having trouble logging into the app on my tablet and need technical help.
My tablet won't load the interactive physics modules; I need assistance troubleshooting the app.

contents.text: For content programming or partnership inquiries, press 2.
For children's programming and features, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our content programming team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to suggest adding more interactive math games for preschoolers.
I'm looking for age-appropriate history programs for my six-year-old
I’d like to obtain the metadata schema for your STEM curriculum videos to integrate into our LMS.
I’d like assistance finding age-appropriate educational shows for my three-year-old grandchild.
I'd like to suggest adding an interactive electromagnetism simulation to the children's learning lineup.

contents.text: For partnership and licensing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships and licensing department.

navigationGoals: I’m interested in licensing your educational videos for my tutoring business.
I run a veterans' family nonprofit and want to discuss licensing your content for our program
I want to discuss enterprise content licensing terms and API access for bulk distribution.
I’m interested in licensing some of your kids’ programs for the small reading group I run.
I'm seeking a licensing agreement to use your educational content in our university physics outreach program.
